text: Munaafiqhiinik Yallih farmoyti tabuuk gaaduh yewqeek gamadal kay amri cineeh daffeyak raaqe mari keenik sinni daffeynat walliteh, sinni maaluuy sinni nafsih Yallih gital yangicilleenim mafaxinnoonuuy yinqibeenih, mariiy marak niqnat mawqina ittak iyyen, Nabiyow Jahannam gira niqnah wohuk gibduk raqta keenik ixxic, usun woh aaxiginnoonuy Nabiik raaqak manannon
